attributes.action: reintroduce the 10% tax band and introduce 50% tax band for those earning over 4 times national average wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As it says in the title this petition is asking the Prime Minister to consider reintroducing the 10% tax band in the next budget and also a 50% tax band for earnings over four times the average national salary. 

The 'four times salary rule' would be a fair method because it would reflect the prosperity of the country and help those with a little more help those with a little less.
